thread.title: Joanne Ernest

author: Joanne Ernest
title: Joanne Ernest
text: Using DogVacay we found a local dog sitter who took such good care of our sweet Morkie, Abu, that we will never again worry so much about him when we have to leave him because we can't take him on vacation with us. We'll still miss him, but we'll know he is having a great vacation too with his new best friend and all his doggie friends at her house. In fact, we might just let him go to socialize with his new dog friends once in a while, he had such a good time there. Finding good care for him became an easy chore with DogVacay. What a good idea!
